replies.txt_content: 我不知道，我真的不知道！~~

replies.author: hhttll
replies.txt_content: 你这么问谁知道啊,推荐你可以去下载DX的

replies.author: a438079631
replies.txt_content: 亲，有可能是网络问题哦，记得杀毒一定要关掉

replies.author: ATTEL
replies.txt_content: 建议换个启动器，如minecraftSP.jar启动器。

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content: 你得用一个可以更新1.4.7的启动器。比如MinecraftSP、MClauncherDX、正版启动器
